a state in the western US, whose capital city is Carson City: Gambling is legal throughout the state of Nevada. The plane disappeared over the Nevada desert.
More examplesFewer examplesHe no longer works in Nevada.Nevada's springs are extremely important to wildlife.The group planned a trip to Nevada.
